post.description:
List of available operators:

Operator Type Expression Example
EQUALS Number 10
NOT_EQUAL Number 10
EQUALS_OR_GREATER_THAN Number 10
EQUALS_OR_LESS_THAN Number 10
GREATER_THAN Number 10
LESS_THAN Number 10
MATCH_REGEXP String /uuid=100[0-9]{2}/
NOT_MATCH_REGEXP String /uuid=100[0-9]{2}/
BEGINS_WITH String abc
ENDS_WITH String zyx
CONTAINS String mnp
NOT_CONTAIN String abc
IN_LIST Array [a, b, c]
NOT_IN_LIST Array [a, b, c]
BETWEEN Array
IS_SET
IS_NOT_SET
IS_TRUE
IS_FALSE
HAS_LABEL whitelist or blacklist
NOT_HAS_LABEL whitelist or blacklist

get.description: Returns list of available flow filters
Returns list of available flow schemas

post.description: Makes a copy of traffic source.

postback_url.description: Postback URL for the Affiliate network

offer_param.description: These params are appends to offer URLs. Example, "sub1={subid}&sub2={campaign_name}"

notes.description: User Notes for the Affiliate network

type.description: Set 'weight' to enable split-testing the flows.

cost_currency.description: Leave empty to use tracker currency

bind_visitors.description: 's' for flows. 'sl' for flows and landing pages. 'slo' for flows, landing pages and offers.

start_date.description: Start date and time. For example, "2017-09-10 20:10"

end_date.description: End date and time. For example, "2017-09-10 20:10"

timezone.description: Timezone for the time range. For example, "Europe/Madrid".

cost.description: Cost for the time range. For example, "19.22".

only_campaign_uniques.description: Apply new costs to unique clicks only.

alias.description: Campaign Alias which is Used in URL http://domain.com/ALIAS

cookies_ttl.description: When the Click Gets Unique Status Again, in Hours

cost_currency.description: Currency Value EUR/USD/RUB/UAH/GBP. Default Value is Taken from the Tracker's Settings.

bind_visitors.description: Bind Visitors Feature (null - disabled/ s - only to streams/ sl - to streams and LPs/ slo  to streams, LPs and offers)

token.description: Token to gain access to Click API

start_date.description: The date and the time for the period to delete, e.g. 2017-04-01 10:10

end_date.description: The date and the time for the period to delete, e.g. 2017-04-01 10:10

timezone.description: Timezone for the dates, e.g., "UTC" or "Europe/Madrid"

limit.description: Clicks Request Limit. Either 'limit' or 'range' Parameters are a Must.

only_campaign_uniques.description: Apply costs only to unique clicks (1 or 0)

FilterCostRequest.description: Send a key-value object to apply filters to clicks. For example, {"sub_id_1": "1,2,3", "source": "site.ru"}.

operator.description: One of the available operators (operators)

id.description: Flow filter ID. Provide it if you update the filter.

payload.description: Flow payload. This field contains values for filters. For example, for a "keyword" Filter an Array ["value1", "value2"] must be provided

ref_name.description:
List of available ref names:
  • ip
  • source
  • ad_campaign_id
  • creative_id
  • keyword
  • ad_campaign_idn
  • sub_id_1..10

payout_auto.description: If true, offer receives payout value from postback

conversion_cap_enabled.description: Turn on that feature if the offer limit conversions per day

daily_cap.description: Daily limit of conversions, after which the tracker will send traffic to another offer

conversion_timezone.description: Which timezone is being used by the Affiliate network for calculating conversions, e.g. UTC or Europe/Madrid

alternative_offer_id.description: Offer id, where to send traffic when daily limit is reached

share.description: Percentage of Traffic Sent to This Offer

interval.description: One of the intervals can be used: today, yesterday, 7_days_ago, first_day_of_this_week, 1_month_ago, first_day_of_this_month, 1_year_ago, first_day_of_this_year, all_time

group.description: Group ID. It's used to group filters in a filters dropdown menu.

template.description: HTML code for rendering filter body view (Not recommended to use)

header_template.description: HTML code for rendering filter body view (Not recommended to use)

position.description: Position of a flow among other flows.

comments.description: Comments or notes for the flow

action_type.description: Action to perform (see 'Retrieve available flow action types')

selected_page.description: The URL of the Page to Check

grab_from_page.description: URL of the page that contains a new URL

reverse.description: Perform also in a reverse mode (true/false)

scan_page.description: Tell AV scanner to scan the page content

PaymentRequired.description: Admin API is not available in that edition
